<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Mature Animal Companion (Druid)](/Feats.aspx?ID=322) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 135 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Animal Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=311)

</column>

---

Your animal companion grows up, becoming a mature animal companion, which grants it additional capabilities. See the [animal companion rules](/Rules.aspx?ID=155) for more information. Your animal companion is better trained than most. During an encounter, even if you don't use the [Command an Animal](/Actions.aspx?ID=58) action, your animal companion can still use 1 action on your turn that round to Stride or Strike.

<title level="2">Mature Animal Companion (Druid) leads to...</title>
[Incredible Companion (Druid)](/Feats.aspx?ID=332)
name: Mature Animal Companion (Druid)
